values.value: Build an automated workflow to process data subject erasure requests within the 30-day GDPR deadline. The right to be forgotten requires organizations to delete personal data when requested, unless a legal exception applies.

Create a Case record type for Data Subject Access Requests with an erasure request category. Build an automated flow that identifies all records containing the data subject's personal data across objects. Implement a two-stage process: first anonymize or delete personal data, then confirm completion to the requestor. Log all erasure actions with timestamps for accountability and audit purposes.
